content: Adds a new Class.DataStore.GetVersionAtTimeAsync method to retrieve data store versions by timestamp.
Adds a Class.Players property named BanningEnabled, which enables/disables the three Class.Players methods that constitute the ban API.
Changes Class.EditableMesh to inherit from Class.Object and live outside the Class.DataModel.
Fixes stale lighting state when transitioning in then out of eager bulk execution.
Fixes voxelization of invalid parts and meshes.
Speeds up performance in the Output window when printing duplicate messages.
Avatar Setup now automatically reruns avatar marketplace validations if you change the scale of your avatar.
Fixes the Plugin Management window infinitely loading.
Adds Class.AssetService.CreateAssetAsync and Class.AssetService.CreateAssetVersionAsync.
Adds an entry to the beta features menu to enable incremental autocomplete in Studio.
Updates AnimationLibrary in Animation Compositor beta.

Adds Class.TextChannel.DirectChatRequester property and TextChannel:SetDirectChatRequester(requestingPlayer) method that you can use to annotate text channels as "requested by" a particular player. Text channels with a DirectChatRequster will automatically use CanUsersDirectChatAsync() appropriately.
Fixes bug where an invalid Class.ParticleEmitter.FlipbookLayout could be applied to a Class.ParticleEmitter if a different property was modified.
Fixes a bug in non-strict mode under the New Solver Beta that causes method calls to incorrectly report argument count mismatches.
Faces now properly animate in Animation Compositor Beta self view.
Fixes a bug in the New Type Solver Beta where property accesses from read-only tables would sometimes incorrectly report an error when read from to initialize another table's keys.
Fixes issues with the mobile touch jump button on character death.
Enables UIStroke to be used in conjunction with rich text.
Fixes a bug where the insert object popup would not let you use the arrow keys to change selection.
Fixes an issue where Class.UIDragDetector|UIDragDetectors would no longer function when the visible property of its parent was toggled during a drag.
Reduces how long it takes to find the desired time position in a Class.VideoFrame.

Updates Luau parser to allow writing parenthesized types in generic type arguments, such as: 
type X = T

local x: X<(() -> ())?>
Fixes a rare bug for in-experience CSG incremental collision geometry.
